entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Blowing snow. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 3 April 2023
